pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Aggressive$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Crimson Ent Tree.$(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)N/A$().$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() 18-24 $(item)Crimson Stems$(), Chance between 1-4 $(item)Crimson Nylium$() or 1-4 $(item)Crimson Fungi$(), Chance between 1-4 $(item)Crimson Fungi$() or 1-4 $(item)Crimson Roots$(), 85%% chance of 1-2 $(item)Diamonds$().

pages.title: Description
pages.text: An ancient creature of horrific rage and lava mixed flora, The Crimson Ent is a massive creature that holds his ground in the rough world of the Nether. Crimson ents are powered by the rough, powerful essence from the Crimson Stem, the insanity of the Crimson Fungus, and the strength and burning rage of the lava. Crimson Ents stand their ground against every foe with their extreme power.
